conbody.p: If you have selected more content than needed using either the Ctrl-Alt-UpArrow hot key or the Edit Select Parent command, you can unselect it.

To unselect a selected element in the Editing Window or ContentMap, do one of the following:
Press Ctrl-Alt-DownArrow once (or multiple times to unselect its selected chidren as well).
Choose Edit Unselect Parent once (or multiple times to unselect its selected chidren as well).
